Package org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentTokenTracker
    Component token tracker is used by components for token life-cycle tracking.
    TokenEventListener
    All token events gathered by TokenTracker can be listened by implementations of this interface.
    TokenTrackerSerializer
    Implementation of this interface should serialise all token tracking events to dedicated target.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicComponentTokenTracker  
    ComplexComponentTokenTracker
    This token tracker is used in components by default.
    CopyComponentTokenTracker
    Token tracker for components which create N out-tokens for one read token, where 1st of the N out-tokens is considered to be the single read token.
    DataRecordContent
    This class represents unstructured data record content.
    DenormalizerComponentTokenTracker
    Token tracker for components reading N tokens for which single out-token is created.
    FileOperationComponentTokenTracker  
    Log4jTokenTrackerSerializer
    This token tracker serializer is dedicated to prints out all token events to log4j logger.
    PrimitiveComponentTokenTracker
    Default component token tracker which is used by all components in case regular ETL graph execution.
    ReaderWriterComponentTokenTracker
    Simple token tracker which frees all incoming tokens and initializes all outgoing tokens.
    ReformatComponentTokenTracker
    Token tracker for components creating N out-tokens for each in-token.
    TokenContent
    This class represents unstructured token content.
    TokenTracker
    This is root class for whole token tracking toolkit.
